Description: This is not your typical Vegas lounge. Because when you settle in, high in the clouds, surrounded by a spectacular sunset you_ll know you_re someplace special. Drink in the view of the unique and spectacular 360› panoramic Las Vegas Skyline. The DJ beats will serve as your soundtrack for an evening of surprising delights. Come for signature cocktails with legendary flair and specialty drinks. Appetizers come from the world class Top of the World restaurant, cocktails are prepared by our award-winning bartenders, and the best bottle service value on Las Vegas Boulevard underscores the experience. Maybe that_s why it_s been named _the best._˜
Location: 2000 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89104

Description: AirBar on Level 108 is the highest bar on the Vegas Strip.Experience Sin City from bold new heights at AirBar, towering 800 feet above the Las Vegas Strip on Level 108 of the Stratosphere Tower.AirBar is all about spectacular views, signature cocktails and a fun vibe. It_s the hot spot for checking out adrenaline junkies taking the ultimate leap of faith at SkyJump, the world's highest controlled descent located just a few feet away. Pop in for some liquid courage, or enjoy a cold refreshment while taking in the view.Drink Specials: $8 16oz Frozen Cocktails$5 Jager Bombs$3 Off Thrill Ride Specialty Drinks
Location: 2000 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89104
